snippet: As pitcher Matt Harvey eagerly waits to be called up, Jason Bay does not want to rush his return.
abstract: New York Mets outfielder Jason Bay does not want to rush his return from mid-June concussion; Mets pitching prospect Matt Harvey is still waiting to be called up.
lead_paragraph: As pitcher Matt Harvey eagerly waits to be called up, Jason Bay does not want to rush his return.

headline.seo: Jason Bay and Matt Harvey Await Mets’ Call
headline.main: Bay Bides His Time in Rehabilitation
headline.print_headline: Bay Bides His Time in Rehabilitation
